name: Recess Vs.
description:
all music, art, sfx, design, programming by ImMatureTony✌ unless otherwise noted below ✌

developed with 💖 in Sacramento, CA

>🙏 game is in ALPHA - bug, balance, AI fixes incoming 🙏<
if you run into a game-breaking bug, reload the page to resume

🍎 NOTE: doesn't yet work in Safari browser, sorry! 👎

Thanks and credit to:

  • Chevy Ray & somepx for their pixel fonts 🔠
  • Henry Software for the full-color pixel art the 2-bit card face art was based on 🃏
  • adamgryu for his conference talk on low-poly/low-rez techniques in Unity 📺
  • rogueNoodle for the 2-bit shader used to render the 3d elements as 4-color 👍
  • Inkle for their narrative scripting language Ink 🦑
  • bestgamekits & Icosphere for various 3d models 🏫 
  • InspectorJ of Freesound.org for footstep sounds 👣
  • klankbeeld for background noise 🚌
